*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/xiaomi/mir3 ''Xiaomi MiWiFi R3'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[http://bigota.miwifi.com/xiaoqiang/rom/r3/miwifi_r3_firmware_65c8a_2.21.166.bin Dev FW]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/04/20/xiaomi-mi-wifi-3-router-unboxing-teardown-and-serial-console/ ''Xiaomi Mi WiFi 3 Router'' on '''CNX|Software'''] :PCB: M30H021T00 ([[Foxconn]]) M26_REV.0102 <!--(02/2016)-->
===Models=== :;[[List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/xiaomi/start ''Xiaomi'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[[Xiaomi MiWiFi 3 (R3)]] • Xiaomi Router 3 • [https://openwrt.org/toh/xiaomi/mir3 ToH] *[[Xiaomi MiWiFi HD (R3D)]] • Xiaomi Router HD :FCC ID: 2AIMRMIWIFIR3D (2017-12-13) *[[Xiaomi MiWiFi 3 Pro (R3P)]] • Xiaomi Router 3 Pro :FCC ID: 2AIMRMIWIFIR3P (2017-08-22)
